tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T120 at the PGA Professional National Championship to earn a spot in the PGA Championship in his home state of Wisconsin.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Earned a PGA Championship berth by finishing T16 at the PGA Professional National Championship and then outlasting five others in a six-way playoff for the final spot...Missed the cut at the PGA Championship by one stroke. 

2010: Won the Minnesota Tapemark Invitational.

2009: Locked up his Wisconsin Section PGA Player of the Year crown for a third consecutive season. 

2008: Earned Wisconsin Section PGA Player of the Year honors for a second consecutive year...Won the Wisconsin Open.

2007: Named Wisconsin Section PGA Player of the Year....Captured the TaylorMade-Adidas Pro-Am Championship.

2006: Was T5 at the PGA Assistants' Professional Championship.
tourBios.personal: PGA professional at Ridgeway CC in Neenah, Wisc...Has made eight career holes-in-one.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR was T76th in 2009 at the U.S. Bank Championship in Milwaukee.
